attributes.action: Stop The Press Invading Our Privacy At Court
attributes.additional_details: You should sign this petition so that we can all come together as 'one' to stop the reporters from invading our privacy and publishing news without our permission and without us even knowing about it!

rejection.details: Can you be more specific?  Most courts are open to the public, and that includes the media who are allowed to report on anything that is allowed in the public domain.  Judges are allowed to put a ban on reporting.
